review: No one wants to have to use a second controller to turn their TV on and off or control the volume.The product and interface seem great after having it for one day. It needs a programming easy fix to make everyone who has purchased the product happy. Add Universal Remote, power and volume control capability; using the center, up and down buttons on the control.The controller already uses infrared technology and universal remote technology is decades old, so combining the two will greatly improve the produce usability.
